title: API Gateway to Lambda to DynamoDb
description: Create a Lambda function that receives a request from API Gateway and inserts a record into a DynamoDB table.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern explains how to deploy a CDK application with Amazon API Gateway, AWS Lambda, and Amazon DynamoDB.

author.headline: Presented by James Eastham, Cloud Infrastructure Architect
author.name: James Eastham
